name: got-25-get-lucky-with-sweet-seats-to-wicked-at-tpac
title: Got $25? Get Lucky With Sweet Seats To WICKED At TPAC
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We’ve been looking forward to opening day of WICKED at TPAC for ages, but we haven’t been looking forward to the price tag for tickets. Luckily, TPAC knows exactly how to cater to the cheapskates in our souls, and they’re doing just that by offering a limited $25 ticket lottery a few hours before the show each night. Interested? Show up two and a half hours before showtime to throw your name in the hat, then stick around for a half hour and see if you scored the goods. If your name is drawn, you can purchase two sweet orchestra seats for just $25 each.

WICKED opens at TPAC’s Andrew Jackson Hall on October 19, running through November 6. Regular tickets run $40-160 and can be purchased here.

Photo by Holster.
